summary: Two gates unguarded. The Rebels could easily infiltrate those gates, until now.
descriptionHtml:
So, in Skyrim, you can find two gates to Cyrodiil. I wondered "Why aren't these guarded?". Well, the question wont be answered, but now there are guards!

This mod adds two guards to the Pale Pass Gate and to the Rift Gate. They are hostile to Stormcloaks and should be pretty compatible with any other mod that does the same as this mod. Please, by all means, use this mod in combination with other Border Mods.
author: k
